ygData.subject: Minions on the Moon
ygData.msgSnippet: Vorpal sat, nestled deeply within the shadows around his throne, the darkness shrouding all but the vibrant glow of his optics. Krytek report! Without

Vorpal sat, nestled deeply within the shadows around his throne, the
darkne=
ss shrouding all but the vibrant glow of his optics. "Krytek
report!"

With=
out turning from his position looking at his own console the
minion respond=
ed. "All is going as planned. We are already receiving
energy readings from=
 the spheres. This Azureblade appears to composed
of self replicating armor=
 of an unusual sort." Krytek paused for a
moment and then continued, "It wo=
uld seem that our initial scans were
somewhat short of the mark, This warri=
or has tremendous potential."

Vorpal nodded as the information now scrolle=
d his own screens. "Yes."
his voice was deep and thoughtful as a crooked in=
dex finger rubbed
against his chin. "However he may not have the right ... =
attitude."
Vorpal chuckled as the screen indicated that the spheres had alr=
eady
initiated their lock-down procedures on this interesting opponent.

A =
communication chirp interrupted Vorpal's revelry. "Yes?" His voice
was all =
business as he opened his end of the communications. 

"My lord, we have su=
cceeded in our first stages of our plan, and new
troops are now at the read=
y." Cyclonus' voice emitted form the
speakers near Vorpal's throne. "Howeve=
r our sensors are detecting
energy signatures of an unusual nature some dis=
tance from your
location. Shall we investigate?"

"We have the situation we=
ll in hand." Vorpal's smile, while invisible,
shrouded as it is in the shad=
ows of his throne, is clearly audible as
he spoke. "However should the situ=
ation not be resolved when you
arrive, we can test out your new troops."

"=
Understood Lord Vorpal." Cyclonus' connection closed as the army of
minions=
 continued toward home. They would be there soon, boosters
flared as they c=
ontinued their flight.

Preston
(Da'minions)
